text:
Samuel Conti (July 16, 1922 – August 29, 2018) was an American jurist. He was a United States District Judge of the United States District Court for the Northern District of California from 1970 until his retirement in 1987. In 1987, he became senior judge of the court. He was born in Los Angeles, California.
Conti died on August 29, 2018 in Oakland, California at the age of 96.

annotations.surface_form: United States District Court for the Northern District of California
